title: Marta Cavalli Leaves FDJ-Suez for DSM: ‘A Good Chance to Restart’
content:
After a season full of challenges, Italian climber Cavalli seeks comeback with three-year deal to join DSM: 'She always wants to give her all.'

Read the full article at Marta Cavalli Leaves FDJ-Suez for DSM: ‘A Good Chance to Restart’ on Velo.
author: ahood
